description: This is an HTML file that defines the structure, style, and client-side scripts for a web-based database viewer interface with navigation, database and table selection, and data display functionalities.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar with database items.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates the interface.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table within a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data table with columns and rows, including handling wide content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for a cell's content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content.
